title: Parthian House 139
description: Remains of a house whose earliest components date (C14) to the Parthian era, located south of the large site of Shahr-i Gholghola in the modern Chahar Burjak region of Afghanistan's Nimruz province.

properties.description: Coordinates from Helmand Sistan Project, verified in Google Earth.
properties.title: Imagery Location of House 139
